part.content: CHAPTER II : AUTHORITIES TO BE APPOINTED OR CONSTITUTED UNDER THE ACT. Sec. 3 - 8.
CHAPTER III : HUNTING OF WILD ANIMALS. Sec. 9 - 17.
CHAPTER IIIA : PROTECTION OF SPECIFIED PLANTS. Sec. 17A - 17H.
Sanctuaries or National Parks declared by Central Government. Sec.38.
CHAPTER IVA : CENTRAL ZOO AUTHORITY AND RECOGNITION OF ZOOS. Sec. 38A - 38J.
CHAPTER IVB : NATIONAL TIGER CONSERVATION AUTHORITY. Sec. 38K - 38X.
CHAPTER IVC : TIGER AND OTHER ENDANGERED SPECIES CRIME CONTROL BUREAU. Sec. 38Y - 38Z.
CHAPTER V : TRADE OR COMMERCE IN WILD ANIMALS, ANIMAL ARTICLES AND TROPHIES. Sec. 39 - 49.
CHAPTER VA : PROHIBITION OF TRADE OR COMMERCE IN TROPHIES, ANIMAL ARTICLES, ETC., DERIVED FROM CERTAIN ANIMALS. Sec. 49A - 49C.
CHAPTER VI : PREVENTION AND DETECTION OF OFFENCES. Sec. 50 - 58.
CHAPTER VIA : FORFEITURE OF PROPERTY DERIVED FROM ILLEGAL HUNTING AND TRADE. Sec. 58A - 58Y.
